com.aht.api.evaluator

Interface Evaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EuclideanLength, ManhattanLength

    public interface Evaluator
    Evaluator should implement two different distance calculations: for items and users, comparing its characteristics and events, respectively. Both methods should return a normalized value between 0 an 1 describing a distance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getEvaluationForItems(Item first, Item second)
      Describes the behavior expected to implement a distance evaluation for two items
      double getEvaluationForUsers(User first, User second)
      Describes the behavior expected to implement a distance evaluation for two users
